doc.field: Series I. Appeal of Conscience Foundation Material
Series I. Appeal of Conscience Foundation Material
Subseries I.E. Peace and Tolerance Conferences
Subseries I.E. Peace and Tolerance Conferences

This series contains correspondence, itineraries, agendas, schedules, notes, folders, brochures, speeches, lists of participants, travel documents, newspaper clippings, photographs, audio cassette tapes, biographical files of speakers, and programs from the Peace and Tolerance Conferences created and run by ACF. The Peace and Tolerance Conferences were held in 1992, 1995, 1999, 2002, and 2005 in various countries outside of the United States. Two of the conferences in 1994 and 2005 were co-sponsored by the Ecumenical Patriarchate. Some material in this subseries is in Russian, Italian, French, or Hebrew. There are some born-digital media--a word document and pdf files--in this subseries.
